document_data.name: Hyaenodon
document_data.mainbody: '''Hyaenodons''' ({{Pronounce|hy|ÆN|o|dan|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|26}}}}), also known as '''hyenodons''' and '''giant hyenas''', were ancient creatures similar but unrelated to [[hyena]]s. They were considered to be within the purview of [[Gorellik]], and were sometimes used by [[gnolls]] as guard beasts.
document_data.Description: These creatures had tawny gold fur, similar to that of a [[lion]].
document_data.Combat: Due to traveling and hunting in packs these creatures were capable of taking down prey larger than themselves, such as [[baluchitherium]]. They would surround their victims and pull them down to the ground with their vise-like jaws.
document_data.Notable Hyaenodons: A group of thirteen exceptionally powerful hyaenodons served [[Amaunator]] by attacking those condemned by the god.
document_data.Trivia: A hyaenodon could be summoned by the ''[[conjure animals]]'' [[spell]].<ref>
